rows.description: The number of rows to display (default is 25)

columns.description: The number of columns to display (default is 25)

duration.description: The duration of the animation (default is 0.1 seconds)

delay.description: The delay of the animation (default is 0.5 seconds)

randomness.description: The amount of randomness to apply to the circumference (default is 0.3, which is Â±15%)
